title: Arista Networks | 4 YOE | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech, CSE
Years of Experience: 4
Company: Arista Networks
Title/Level: SWE
Location: Bangalore
Base pay: 36L (PF + Gratuity included)
Signing Bonus: 2L
Stock bonus: $45000 (25% vesting for 4 years)
Anniversary Bonus: 3L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 50LPA
Benefits:  Insurance, Sodexo
